verses.text:
A joy - by day - a peace by night, My Saviour makes my darkness bright;
With love my heart is fully blessed, And I can find in Jesus rest.

I joy - ful feel and ho - ly keep, My soul can feel his presence deep;
In joy - ful - or - der - ful love, Won - der - ful love of Jesus.

chorus.text:
Won - der - ful love! won - der - ful love!
Won - der - ful love! won - der - ful love!
Won - der - ful love of Jesus!
